Feats-Skill-Performance -- Female Half-Elf Bard: 2
Strength: 10 (+0) Dexterity: 14 (+2) Constitution: 12 (+1) Intelligence: 14 (+2) Wisdom: 14 (+2) Charisma: 14 (+2)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 1500/2000 Level: 2 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 5/10
Ability Notes: Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry; Class; Skill Selectable Feature Count: Bard (Muse); Human (Heritage)
Feats: Cantrip Expansion; Cooperative Nature; Fascinating Performance; Impressive Performance; Legendary Performer; Virtuosic Performer Bard Features: Ability Boost (Charisma); Ability Boosts; Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Longsword; Rapier; Sap; Shortbow; Shortsword; Whip; Unarmed Attacks); Bard Feats; Bard Skills; Composition Spells; Defense Trained (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense); Maestro; Muse; Occult Spellcasting; Perception Expert; Save Expert (Will); Save Trained (Fortitude; Reflex); Skill Feats; Spell Trained (Occult) Acolyte Features: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from Intelligence, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Religion; Scribing Lore); Student Of The Canon Human Features: Ability Boost (Choose 2 from any); Ancestry Feats; Half-Elf; Human Heritage
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: Ancestry Feat (Choose 1 from any)
Bard Feats: Class Feat (Choose 1 from any)
Half-Elf: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Maestro: Has the Lingering Composition feature
Muse: 1 selection
Skill Feats: Skill Feat (Choose 1 from any)
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Half-Elf: Has the elf trait and can take elf and half-elf feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +8 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +2 (dexterity; untrained) Engineering Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +6 (wisdom; trained)
Arcana: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Folktale Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained)
Athletics: +0 (strength; untrained) Intimidation: +6 (charisma; trained) Society: +6 (intelligence; trained)
Crafting: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Medicine: +2 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +2 (dexterity; untrained)
Deception: +2 (charisma; untrained) Nature: +2 (wisdom; untrained) Survival: +2 (wisdom; untrained)
Diplomacy: +2 (charisma; untrained) Occultism: +6 (intelligence; trained) Thievery: +2 (dexterity; untrained)
Dwarven Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +8 (charisma; expert)
Languages: Abyssal; Common; Sylvan; Undercommon
Skill Notes:
Bard Skills: Skill Trained (Occultism; Performance; Choose 6 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Fascinating Performance: Can fascinate 4 targets for 1 rd with a successful Performance vs. Will
Impressive Performance: Can use Performance to Make An Impression
Legendary Performer: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step when they succeed on a DC 10 Society check to Recall Knowledge/Increases the audience level when Earning Income using Performance
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Virtuosic Performer: +1 checks on a chosen Performance type
Combat
Hit Points: 26 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Save: Fortitude: +5 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +6 (dexterity; trained); Will: +8 (wisdom; expert)
Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 3; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 2 Attack: Occult: +6 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult: 16 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Counter Performance (O1 Foc Enc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation can substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Inspire Courage (OC1 Foc Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Lingering Composition (O1 Foc Enc): (F) A successful Performance check increases the duration of a subsequent cantrip composition to 3 rd, or 4 rd on a critical success; failure does not expend a Focus Point
Soothe (O1 Enc): (2) R30' Target regains 1d10+4 HP and gains +2 saves vs. mental effects for 1 min (heightened +1 restores +1d10+4 HP)
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Inspire Courage occult spells/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Lingering Composition: Knows the Lingering Composition occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Maestro: Knows the Soothe occult spell
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare 2 additional cantrips each day or add 2 additional cantrips to repertoire
Occult Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Notes
Validation Errors:
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 1 available vs. 4 allocated
Legendary Performer Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 15, performance rank (currently 2) >= 4 and virtuosic performer feature (currently 1)
